properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO , LOCATION_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ALIAS , EMAIL , GENDER , AGE , ENROLL_DATE , REPORT_COUNT , STATUS , PF_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO , LOCATION_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ALIAS , EMAIL , GENDER , AGE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO RECENT_MUSIC ( MEMBER_NO , LOCATION_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.CURRVAL , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND EMAIL = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?

SELECT MEMBER_NO , LOCATION_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ALIAS , EMAIL , GENDER , AGE , ENROLL_DATE , REPORT_COUNT , STATUS , PF_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = ? AND MEMBER_NAME = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
